thread.title: Pic: Emraan Hashmi and wife on a romantic dinner date
thread.title_full: Pic: Emraan Hashmi and wife on a romantic dinner date | Hindi Movie News - Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Pic: Emraan Hashmi and wife on a romantic dinner date
text:
Emraan Hashmi has not made a lot of public appearances with wife Parveen Hashmi . So it was quite a pleasant surprise when the two were spotted out on a dinner date in Mumbai recently. 

Emraan Hashmi feels that the change in Bollywood is for the better Emraan Hashmi is enthusiastic with the changes he sees in the Hindi film industry today. 
The celeb couple was spotted out together grabbing a bite. Both Emraan and his wife looked stunning in black as they posed for the shutterbugs. It is great to see the two spending quality time together considering that they have had a rough couple of years due to their son's health. However, now that Emraan's cute little son has recovered, life is back to normal for the Hashmis and it is really nice to see them steal this romantic date. 

Bengaluru: Emraan Hashmi, Nandana Dev Sen take centrestage with children at prelude to Times LitFest 00:45
